entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -12.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
